about_the_game:
Overview
World Eternal: Battlegrounds combines the strategic depth of MOBAs, the high-stakes intensity of Battle Royale, and the fast-paced excitement of arcade games. Collect powerful heroes, equip them with legendary gear, and dominate the battlegrounds in this groundbreaking game featuring a fully open game economy.

Key Features
Dynamic MOBA-Battle Royale-Arcade Hybrid Gameplay:
Experience thrilling battles with the strategic elements of MOBAs, the survival aspects of Battle Royale, and the quick, action-packed fun of arcade games.

Hero and Gear Collection:
Collect a diverse array of heroes, each with unique abilities and playstyles. Equip them with powerful gear to enhance their capabilities and customize your gameplay experience.

Open Game Economy:
The first game of its kind to feature a fully open economy. Trade your in-game items freely on Steam, creating a vibrant marketplace driven by players.

Massive Battle Royale Arenas:
Drop into vast battlegrounds where only the strongest survive. Utilize strategy, skill, and a bit of luck to emerge victorious.

Strategic MOBA Elements:
Master the battlegrounds by developing strategies, understanding the strengths and weaknesses of different heroes, and making smart gear choices.

Arcade Action:
Fast-paced gameplay keeps you on your toes. Quick reflexes and sharp instincts are rewarded in intense, adrenaline-pumping matches.

Regular Updates:
Frequent updates bring new heroes, gear, and features to keep the gameplay fresh and exciting.

Game Modes
Battle Royale:
Drop into massive battlegrounds with up to 100 players. Scavenge for gear, outwit your opponents, and be the last hero standing.

MOBA PvP:
Engage in intense player-versus-player battles where strategy and skill determine the victor. Push lanes, destroy enemy towers, and achieve ultimate victory.

Cooperative Play:
Team up with friends to tackle challenging missions and earn exclusive rewards.

Arcade Challenges:
Test your skills in a variety of fast-paced arcade challenges. Compete for high scores and bragging rights.

content_descriptors.notes:
Violence & Combat: 
The game features fantasy combat with weapons and abilities. Mild blood and injury effects are present during battles.

Character Outfits: Some characters wear mildly revealing outfits.

General Fantasy Themes: The storyline includes typical fantasy themes involving conflict and heroism.

name: World Eternal: Battlegrounds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4096 MB available space

short_description: A thrilling blend of MOBA, Battle Royale, and arcade action with an innovative hero and gear collection system. Experience the first open game economy where players can trade items freely on Steam!
